title: In his first term, administration officials regularly curbed President Trump’s impulses. In his second, Trump has been surrounded by fewer people who try to dissuade him

President Trump on Wednesday fired Robert Primus, a board member of the railroad regulator that is weighing the proposed megamerger between Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern. Primus said he planned to challenge the termination.
